titleStmt.title: The case of George Taylor, Esq; Marshal of the King's Bench. In relation to a clause added to the Bill, intitled, An Act for rgulating [sic] the abuses in prisons and pretended priviledged places.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, George, Marshal of the King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: Apparently concerning the Bill of 20 February 1701 for regulating the prisons of the King's Bench. Wing dates this item 1700?
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
